New Records: LaMelo Ball scored 32 points to help the Hornets snap a 10-game losing streak
Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball drew in two defenders and dished to an open Brandon Miller, who knocked down a wide-open 3-pointer from the corner to put the Hornets up by 11 with 1:21 left in the game
Post-Match Reflections: The Hornets snapped a 10-game losing streak with a 115-104 win over the Suns
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets took a 13-point lead at the half after outscoring the Suns 37-17 in the second quarter
Charlotte dominated Phoenix on the glass, outrebound the Suns 59-42
Others: The Suns have lost five of their last six games
This was only the third game this season — and first time for back-to-back games — the Hornets have had all five starters on the floor together
